English: jinghu, a smaller, higher-pitched erhu `二胡~ (two-stringed fiddle) used to accompany Chinese opera

d.f: `樂器~`名~。`形似~`二胡~`而~`形制~`較~`小的~`拉~`弦樂器~。`竹~`製~`琴~`筒~，`音色~`高亢~，`主要~`用~`於~`京劇~`伴奏~。

English: jinghu, a smaller, higher-pitched erhu `二胡~ (two-stringed fiddle) used to accompany Chinese opera
